timeline.bodyText:
I'm not really sure if this will introduce any regression as we are completely ditching ACCES_TOKEN which was added in #636 > #650
I would probably do as the issue suggests ("...Probably this code needs to be adapted to use either access-token or id-token, depending on what is available.."): so try to use ID_TOKEN or try to fallback to ACCESS_TOKEN
timeline.author: manusa

replies.bodyText:
@manusa good point... reading the kubectl source code I thought it cannot use access-token directly, but in fact it's used on gcloud.
I will refactor the code to support both cases.
replies.author: matthyx
